entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOP @WhiteHouse No one believes these lies. If Trump had done all the great things you say he did, we wouldn’t have 130,000+ dead & counting, full ICUs, almost 3 million infected & a majority of states with positive test rates going up. It didn’t have to be this way. #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #COVID19
